name: ProjectRogue
tagline: small game project because im bored
body:
### Welcome to ProjectRogue (real name TBD)
ProjectRogue is my small game project.  
You can download the latest release [here](https://github.com/brokoli78/ProjectRogue/releases).  
Please report bugs [here](https://github.com/brokoli78/ProjectRogue/issues).  
You can also request features and suggest improvements there. Your participation is greatly appreciated. :)  
The wiki is located [here](https://github.com/brokoli78/ProjectRogue/wiki), contributions are always welcome.  
Now have fun with the game!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
